column3: 2015 to laugh often and love much; to win the respect of intelligentpersons and the affection of children; to earn the approbation of honest criticsand to endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty; to find the best in others; to give of ones self; to leave the world a bit better
column6: or a redeemed social condition; to have played and laughed with enthusiasmand sung with exultation; to know that even one life hasbreathed easier because you have lived
column7: this is to have succeededralph waldo emerson. upcoming events. memorial service. jun 11. 11:00 am st. germain'shoodsport
